While Mohammad Sayyam, Abdul Subhan, Huzaifa Ahsan took 2 wickets each.​​

VB-G Ram G: President gives assent to Bill; oppn slams new jobs scheme
description: President Droupadi Murmu has approved the Viksit Bharat—Guarantee for Rozgar and Ajeevika Mission (Gramin) Bill, 2025, replacing the MGNREGA. The new law guarantees 125 days of wage employment annually to rural households volunteering for unskilled manual work, aligning with the Viksit Bharat 2047 vision. Opposition parties have criticized the move, citing concerns over undermining Mahatma Gandhi's legacy.

India is monitoring the situation in Bangladesh and has conveyed strong concerns over minority atrocities, urging justice for the victim.

These measures prioritize health amidst extreme weather.

description: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' is shattering box office records, entering its third week with impressive earnings. The film defied competition from 'Avatar Fire And Ash', even showing growth on its third Saturday. Mountains older than memory: How new 'definition' of Aravalli risks eroding 'Viksit Bharat'
description: India's ancient Aravalli Range faces a new definition crisis after a Supreme Court ruling.  The court accepted a 100-meter elevation threshold for identifying the hills, sparking concerns among environmentalists. Critics argue this narrow view ignores the range's vital ecological functions, potentially opening it to unchecked mining and real estate development, threatening water security and climate stability.

Jaffer's critique follows Shubman Gill's surprising omission. Axar Patel is now vice-captain. The tournament, co-hosted by Sri Lanka and India, sees the defending champions in Group A.

title: Investor onboarding loses pace: Fresh equity registrations fall 11% in November
description: New investor additions to India's stock markets slowed in November, with 13.2 lakh new traders joining, an 11.6% dip from October. Global uncertainty impacted participation, though the overall investor base reached 12.3 crore. This moderation follows a period of rapid growth, indicating a cautious sentiment among potential investors amidst volatile global conditions.

Can I lore drop? How Gen Z language is changing mental therapy, one word at a time
description: Young patients are increasingly using social media-derived psychological terms in therapy, presenting a new challenge for clinicians. While this vocabulary aids expression, it also leads to self-diagnosis and over-pathologizing normal experiences. Therapists are adapting to bridge this linguistic gap, validating feelings while reframing them accurately.

title: Pay to meet Tihar inmates: Operators' role under lens over illegal mulakat charges
description: A racket charging relatives for legally free inmate meetings at Tihar Jail has been exposed. An inmate's tip-off led to an investigation where undercover officials were asked for money. As a precaution, 20-25 data entry operators were transferred while the probe into touts and system misuse continues. Biometric authentication is being introduced to enhance security.
